summary: WHEN THE DRIVER ATTEMPTED TO PUT THE VEHICLE INTO REVERSE IT STALLED.  THIS INCIDENT REPEATED APPROXIMATELY FIVE TIMES AT WHICH TIME THE CONSUMER NOTICED A MESSAGE ON THE DRIVER INFORMATION CENTER STATING SOMETHING ABOUT A LOCKED STEERING WHEEL.  THE CONSUMER TURNED THE VEHICLE OFF AND WAITED ABOUT FIFTEEN MINUTES, AFTERWHICH THE VEHICLE STARTED AND OPERATED AS NORMAL   *MR   *SCC  *NLM  REF. IN EA02-031 *CJS
